page.title: 05GAINSBOROUGH SPORTS, IPSWICH
page.content: Opened in July 1983,the sports centre serving the south-east of Ipswich, provides a great variety of activities for people to use their increasing leisure time effectively. Built in a far corner of land owned by the controlers of Ipswich Airport, the manager, Mr Phil Rogers reports a variety of activities for local people. Football,squash, badminton, aerobics and karate are just a few of the sports available throughout the day.The centre is run by Ipswich Borough Council and prices are kept as low as possible, especially for the unemployed and senior citizens.Access to the centre is well sign-posted from Nacton Road.
